Sizde ehliyet sınavını ilk girişte kazanmak, herkesten önce son güncel sınav sorularına erişmek, sınav hakkında sınava girmiş kimselerin düşüncelerine ve tüyolarına erişmek ister misiniz?

O zaman uygulamamıza hoşgeldiniz.
Uygulamamızı satın aldığınızda neleri satın almış olacaksınız.
 * Artık soru çözerken sizi rahatsız eden REKLAMLAR görmeyeceksiniz.
 * 2021 Nisan ayında, Mart 2021 Ehliyet sınav soruları ilk göreceksiniz.
 * Düzenli olarak sadece sizin görebileceğiniz, sınava girmiş kimselerin görüşlerini, tüyolarını aktaracağız.

Ehliyet sınavlarına hazırlamakta ne kadar iyi olduğumuzu, "bizimle hazırlananların ilk girişte sınavı geçtiğini" söylemekle kalmıyoruz. Sizlere bugüne kadar en çok indirilen ve en çok beğenilen uygulama olduğumuzu söylüyoruz.

Ehliyet sınav sorularını çözerken yaptığınız yanlış soruları, yanlışlar testinde tekrar tekrar görüp çözebileceksiniz. Örneğin ehliyet sınavına hazırlanırken yapamadığınız soruları sınava girmeden hemen önce bu soruları tekrar çözerek pekiştirebileceksiniz.

Ehliyet sınavında kaç soru çıkar. Hangilerini çözmeliyiz gibi soruların cevaplarını bulabileceğiniz "Sık Sorulan Sorular" sayfasından takip edilebilecektir.

summary.label:
AnkiMobile is a mobile companion to Anki, a powerful, intelligent flashcard program that is free, multi-platform, and open-source. Sales of this app support the development of both the computer and mobile version, which is why the app is priced as a computer application.

AnkiMobile was written by the lead developer of Anki and AnkiWeb, and it has been around since 2010. Beware other apps using "Anki" in their name that have sprung up recently - they are not compatible with the rest of the Anki ecosystem, and they offer far fewer features.

Some of AnkiMobile's features include:

- A free cloud synchronization service that lets you keep your card content synchronized across multiple mobile and computer devices. This makes it easy to add content on a computer and then study it on your mobile, easily keep your study progress current between an iPhone and iPad, and so on.
- The same proven scheduling algorithm that the computer version of Anki uses, which reminds you of material as you're about to forget it.
- A flexible interface designed for smooth and efficient study. You can set up AnkiMobile to perform different actions when you tap or swipe on various parts of the screen, and control which actions appear on the tool buttons.
- Comprehensive graphs and statistics about your studies.
- Support for large card decks - even 100,000+ cards.
- If your cards use images or audio clips, the media is stored on your device, so you can study without an internet connection.
- A powerful search facility that allows you to find cards that match criteria such as 'tagged high priority, answered in the last ten days and not containing the following words', and automatically place them into a deck to study.
- Support for displaying mathematical equations with MathJax, and rendering LaTeX created with the computer version.
- Support for adding images drawn with the Apple Pencil to your cards.

Please note that AnkiMobile is currently intended as a companion to the computer version of Anki, rather than a complete replacement for it. While AnkiMobile is able to display and schedule your cards in the same way the computer version does, certain changes like modifying note types need to be done with the computer software. Add-ons are not supported, so while you can study image occlusion cards created with the computer version, they can not be created within AnkiMobile. For this reason, please start with the computer version of Anki before you think about buying this app.

The cloud synchronization service is optional, and data can also be imported/exported from the app via a USB cable or AirDrop.

Like all apps, AnkiMobile can be purchased once and then used on multiple devices in a household using the same Apple ID. Family sharing is also supported. For information on bulk discounts for educational institutions, please see Apple's Volume Purchase Program.

For more information on AnkiMobile, including a link to the online manual, please have a look at the support page: https://docs.ankimobile.net/support.html. If you have any questions or want to report an issue, please let us know on our support site and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

summary.label:
Hit the Button Math is an app designed to help develop mental math and calculation skills.

The app is aimed at 5-11 year olds. There are 166 different game modes of varying difficulty so it is useful throughout grades K-5. Answer as many questions as possible in minute-long games, or you can now practice without the pressure of a countdown timer - a feature which is new for 2019. Questions are randomly generated which means it is very replayable. The game has been carefully designed for children, with large, widely spaced buttons. We recommend that young children play on a tablet.

Six main topics are covered: 

* Times tables - up to 10 or 12 
* Division - up to 10 or 12
* Square numbers
* Number bonds
* Doubling 
* Halving

Between these topics, the four standard arithmetic operations are covered: addition, subtraction, multiplication and division.

You can create up to 30 player profiles per device to track an individual's high scores (increased from 15 in 2019). If you prefer there's also the option to play as a guest. All data is stored locally on your device so you don't have to worry about privacy issues. We've also made it very easy for children to quickly switch between profiles after playing a game, if they're sharing a device.

After each game, the score achieved is displayed along with the child's high score. Bronze, silver or gold stars and trophies are awarded depending on the score achieved in each game.

Düşünsene gerçek sınava girdin, karşına bir soru çıktı ve dedin ki "İnanmıyorum! Ben bu soruyu deneme sınavında görmüştüm." Harika olmaz mı?

YKS Türkiye 1.lerini, başarılı olanları görüyoruz, izliyoruz. Youtube'da onlarca video var ve tüm bu başarılı öğrenciler denemelerin ve tekrar yapmanın öneminden bahsediyor.

Sen de YKS'ye hazırlanırken yıl boyunca her hafta en az 1 tane deneme çözüyorsun. Bu TYT ve AYT denemelerinde karşını çok önemli sorular çıkıyor. Yapamadığın soruları, konuları keşfetmen çok önemli. Çok ama çok önemli...

Son çözdüğün denemedeki sorular ne oldu? Yapamadığın soruları öğretmenlerine sordun mu? Sorduysan bile tekrar ettin mi?

Soru Hafızam uygulaması işte bu işe yarıyor. Her YKS denemesinden sonra yapamadığın ya da dikkatini çeken soruların fotograflarını uygulamaya kaydedeceksin. İstersen çözümünü de kaydedeceksin ve Soru Hafızam uygulaması sana sınava kadar her bir soruyu tam 5 kere tekrar ettirecek.

Soruyu ekledikten hemen 1 gün sonra, 3 gün sonra, 7 gün sonra, 1 ay sonra ve 3 ay sonra... Telefonuna senin istediğin saatte bildirim gönderiyor ve bu soruları sana tekrar ettiriyor. Psikoloji biliminde bu tekniğin adı "Spaced Repetition" yani "Aralıklı Tekrar", internetten araştırabilirsin.

Bir bilgiyi zihnimizde yeniden ziyaret etmediğimizde o bilgi unutuluyor. O yüzden belirli aralıklarla tekrar yapman çok önemli. Bu yüzden Deneme Hafızası uygulaması her önemli YKS sorusunu uygun aralıklarla tam 5 kere tekrarlatıyor. Bir soruyu 5 kere tekrar ettikten sonra unutur musun sence?

"As a traffic school instructor, I think your theory tests are really good. Updated and just as difficult as the real ones at Trafikverket." 
/Andrej Panevin, DriveSafe traffic school

"As a former driver examiner at Trafikverket I can recommend you to get iKörkort! The app will make your studying much easier!”
/Rune Wåhlin


iKörkort lets you play your way through the driver’s licence theory in the fun and educational game mode The Licence Game. It consists of short levels with theory lessons, road signs and various types of tests. During the course of the game you collect stars and unlock medals. When you have finished the game, you will have gained all the knowledge you need to pass the real theory test!

iKörkort also contains five different types of test: smart practice tests, theory tests, road signs tests, subject tests and custom tests where you choose the settings yourself. Our database contains over 1,300 theory questions which are very similar to the questions on the real test. In order to give you a deeper understanding of the driver’s licence theory all questions have an explanation that will quickly help you understand even the most difficult questions.

The app also features a searchable and easy-to-read theory book that tests your knowledge after each theory chapter, detailed test statistics showing your progress in 65 different subjects, a smart checklist that guides you through all the steps required to get your driver’s licence and a searchable road signs reference guide!


CONTENTS AND FEATURES

• 1,300 theory questions with detailed explanations.

• Fun and educational game mode that makes study easy and fun.

• Five different types of test: smart practice tests, theory tests, road signs tests and custom tests where you choose the settings yourself.

• Educational and straightforward corrections that link each question directly to the licence theory.

• Test statistics that show your progress and make it easy to start tests on the subjects you need to study the most.

• Easy-to-read licence theory full of pictures, examples and useful functions - continue reading where you left off, see how much you have left in each chapter, bookmark important sections, and test your knowledge after each chapter.

• Smart checklist that guides you through all the steps required to get your driver’s licence.

• Ability to pause and resume tests as well as review all completed tests and saved questions.

• A searchable reference guide featuring all of Sweden’s road signs, where you can also save difficult road signs.

• Possibility to study in either English or Swedish.

• No monthly fees. No in-app purchases. No ads.

• Fast customer service.


100% UP-TO-DATE

The driver’s licence questions in iKörkort cover everything you need to learn to pass the theory test and as soon as a new traffic rule is introduced or changed, we update the questions.


ENGLISH AND SWEDISH

All content is available in both English and Swedish. To switch between the languages, simply change the language in your device’s settings. You can also change language back and forth while doing tests, just like on the theory test!

Mit dieser App bereiten Sie sich perfekt auf die schriftliche Prüfung laut Ausbilder-Eignungsverordnung (AEVO), auch umgangssprachlich AdA-Schein (Ausbildung der Ausbilder) genannt, vor.

Die App, vom geprüften Ausbilder für zukünftige Ausbilder erstellt, beinhaltet mehr als 500 ausgewählte Fragen aus allen vier Handlungsfeldern, die teilweise ähnlich denen in der Original Ausbildereignungsprüfung der zuständigen Stellen (IHK und teilweise HWK) aufgebaut sind. Im Zuge der kompakten Darstellung für mobile Endgeräte wurde allerdings, abweichend zu den Originalprüfungen in Papierform, auf umfangreiche Texteinleitungen verzichtet. Die Aufgaben sind im Multiple-Choice-Verfahren angelegt und haben, wie bei der echten Prüfung auch, eine oder mehrere richtige Antworten. Die Reihenfolge der Fragen und zugehörigen Antworten ändert sich bei jedem Durchlauf.

Besonders viel Wert wurde bei der Erstellung der App auf eine einfache und intuitive Bedienung nach den Apple Design Empfehlungen gelegt. Sie können wie bei der realen Prüfung frei zwischen den Fragen springen und diese so in beliebiger Reihenfolge beantworten sowie ggf. nachträglich korrigieren.

Die App ist in mehrere Module unterteilt:
Ein Lernmodul bietet die Möglichkeit, anhand einer Anzahl zufällig ausgewählter Fragen aus den verschiedenen Handlungsfeldern zu trainieren oder alle zuletzt markierten Fragen erneut durchzugehen.
Im Lernmodul können Sie sich jederzeit die richtigen Lösungen anzeigen lassen. Gleichfalls lassen sich jederzeit weitere Fragen auf die Merkliste setzen und später erneut abrufen. Gelernte Fragen können einfach entsprechend markiert werden und werden dann nicht mehr abgefragt.

Das Prüfungsmodul erlaubt die Durchführung einer Prüfungssituation mit einer festen üblichen Anzahl Fragen. Abweichend zum Lernmodul läuft hier die Zeit mit und beim Abschluss der Prüfung erfolgt eine Bewertung nach offiziellen AEVO-Richtlinien.

Das Auswertungsmodul gibt Ihnen ein detailliertes Feedback über Ihre bisher durchgeführten Prüfungen. Bereits abgeschlossene Prüfungen lassen sich erneut abrufen und so Defizite leicht erkennen. Anhand der übersichtlichen Auswertung fällt es Ihnen leicht zu entscheiden, ob Sie sich bereits ausreichend auf die schriftliche Prüfung nach der AEVO vorbereitet haben.

Außerdem enthält die App noch ein Seite mit Tipps, die Ihnen helfen sollen, damit Sie sich bei der echten Prüfung bei der IHK (und teilweise HWK) sicherer fühlen.

Wir wünschen Ihnen viel Erfolg auf Ihrem Weg zum Ausbilder und für Ihren Ausbilderschein.

Feature Übersicht:
* mehr als 500 ausgewählte Fragen
* Aufgaben im Multiple-Choice-Verfahren
* Antworten in zufälliger Reihenfolge
* beliebige Reihenfolge der Beantwortung und Korrektur der Fragen
* Simulation der Prüfung
* Lernmodul mit Auswahl der Fragen nach Handlungsfeldern
* Fragen jederzeit als gelernt markieren
* Merkliste zur Wiederholung von Fragen
* Kauf der App enthält vollständigen Funktionsumfang
* keine Registrierung benötigt
* keine Internetverbindung notwendig

summary.label:
NoteWorks is a musical game, designed to teach note recognition and improve sight reading skills. Hungry Munchy is eager to swallow elusive blue notes. Your goal is to help Munchy catch each note as quickly as possible. 

The game combines learning and fun into a single gratifying experience. The app is both educational and entertaining, with an intuitive and visually appealing interface. 

NoteWorks was created for: 
• iPhone, iPod touch and iPad users.
• Players of all ages. 
• Beginners to advanced music students. 
• Families with multiple players. 
• Music teachers with multiple students. 

Game design features include: 
• A funny animated character. 
• User-friendly menus. 
• Superb graphics. 
• Engaging sound effects. 

Note reading options: 
• On-screen piano keyboard input.
• On-screen guitar fretboard input.
• MIDI keyboard input.  
• "A, B, C" note naming:
. . . CDEFGAB
. . . CDEFGAH
. . . ABCDEFG
. . . AHCDEFG 
• "Do, Re, Mi" (Fixed Do) note naming. 
• Treble clef. 
• Bass clef. 
• Tenor clef. 
• Alto clef. 
• Custom note range in all four clefs.

Educational features: 
• Students learn by playing and having fun. 
• Multiple game settings allow players to stay in control. 
• Students can choose to play with hints. 
• Students play without hints to earn points and stars. 
• Players learn to recognize notes instantly, on sight. 
• For beginners, the game starts by teaching a limited range of notes. 
• Note range can be easily customized as students advance. 
• After mastering accidentals, students learn key signatures. 
• Game speed is controlled to increase or decrease difficulty, or students may choose to play without any time limit.
• Sharing of game progress: ability to share game results with teachers.

While music teachers persistently stress the importance of sight reading, most teachers prefer not to spend valuable lesson time on basic note recognition skills. Thus, NoteWorks helps music teachers concentrate on more interesting aspects of their art, such as technique and musicality. 

Serious music students can take advantage of the game to learn clefs outside of their own instruments, as well as prepare for music theory exams. In addition, non-musicians could use NoteWorks as an interesting memory game, to help keep their minds sharp and quick. 

NoteWorks was created for people who like to learn by playing and having fun. It was designed with the objective of neither being too easy nor too hard, and never boring. We hope you'll find NoteWorks both useful and entertaining, and we would greatly appreciate it if you could share your thoughts and opinions about the game by rating it.

summary.label:
Английские слова - это самый простой способ пополнить словарный запас.

Всего за несколько минут в день вы незаметно для себя выучите 1500 слов.
Уникальная методика навсегда закрепит в вашей памяти сами слова и примеры их употребления на английском языке.

Вы выучите слова из следующих наборов:
• Базовый
• Неправильные глаголы
• Путешествие
• Дом
• Время
• Пространство
• Семья
• Овощи и фрукты
• Профессии
• Погода
• Одежда 
• Спорт
• Части тела
• Животные
• Языки и национальности
• Политика и общество
• География
• Ложные друзья переводчика
• Фразовые глаголы
• Еда
• Экономика

ИНФОРМАЦИЯ НА ЭКРАНЕ

На экран выводится следующая информация:
• Количество баллов. Отображается в правом верхнем углу. Означает количество баллов по текущему слову.
• Процент изученности. Означает процент изученности слов в словаре.

КАК НАЧИСЛЯЮТСЯ БАЛЛЫ

За правильный ответ начисляется 1 балл, за неправильный - снимается 2 балла, при просмотре карточки балл не засчитывается.

Первые три балла начисляются при изучении слова, их можно набрать сразу. После этого слово переходит на повтор и баллы по нему не начисляются пока не настанет время повтора.

Четвертый балл дается при повторе через 1 день.
Пятый балл дается при повторе  ещё через 3 дня.

Итого, слово может стать выученным на пятый день, если вы набрали 5 баллов.

КАК ЭТО РАБОТАЕТ.

Программа предлагает вам на русском языке слово и предложение с этим словом. Вам необходимо ответить, как данное слово в текущем контексте должно быть переведено на английский язык.

Если вы ответили правильно, программа похвалит вас. Если вдруг ошиблись - подскажет правильный ответ и покажет карточку слова.
В любом случае вам будет показан английский вариант предложения.

Разные формы слов учатся и учитываются в статистике независимо. Например, по словам I и me, see и saw подсчёт ведётся отдельно.

Карточку слова можно посмотреть выбрав соответствующий пункт меню.
Процесс изучения слов начинается с того, что программа набирает из своего словаря 15 слов и начинает их показывать в случайном порядке.

После того, как слово переходит в группу "повторяемые" из словаря извлекается следующее слово.

Повтор производится через 1, 2 дня. Время, когда будет показан повтор всегда исчисляется от времени предыдущего ответа.

Если вы отвечаете правильно на все повторы, то слово переходит в группу "выученные" и больше не будет предлагаться.
Если вы посмотрели карточку, то баллы не начисляются.

СЛОВАРЬ
На текущий момент словарь программы содержит около 1500 наиболее употребляемых английских слов, а также слов используемых в программе "Полиглот".
Неправильные глаголы представлены в первой и второй формах. Подсчет баллов по каждой форме идет независимо. Слова в словаре расположены в порядке изучения.

ОЗВУЧКА
Доступно произношение английского предложения.

Explore the deep sea and the animals that call it home. Play with and learn about sharks, penguins, octopuses, seahorses, turtles and many others!

With "What’s in The Oceans?" you can play and learn freely, with no pressure or stress. Play, observe, ask questions and find the answers. Explore how animals interact with each other, how they live, how they defend themselves and how they reproduce.

Learn and get informed about the pollution of the oceans and its dangers. See how plastics, overfishing, climate change and ships affect the life and health of different ecosystems. We only have one planet — let's take care of it!

With five incredible ecosystems:

South Pole
Discover the life of penguins, seals and orcas. Play with them! What do they eat and how do they live? How does climate change affect them?

Octopuses
Feed the sharks and learn how octopuses defend themselves and not be devoured. Try to protect the divers inside the shark cage!

Dolphins
See how the dolphins hunt, reproduce and come out to breathe. Play with them until it becomes night so they can go to sleep. Watch the fishing nets — if the dolphins get caught in them, they will not be able to come out to breathe.

Turtles
Feed the turtles and watch them lay eggs. Help the younglings to get out of the egg, and make sure the turtles don't eat the plastic bags, as they sometime mistake them for jellyfish. Look at the remoras — they always hitch a ride on the turtles.

Seahorses
Seahorses are small and fragile. Protect them from their predators, crabs, and make the algae and corals grow so they can hide.

Features

• Discover how animals live and how they interact in different ecosystems.

summary.label:
Ezberle Nedir?
Ezberle, yabancı dil öğreniminin en önemli aşamalarından biri olan kelime ezberleme çalışmalarınız için hazırlanmış bir destek uygulamasıdır.
Uygulamada tanımlı olan kelime setlerini kullanarak yeni kelimeler ezberleyebilir ve düzenli kelime tekrarları yapabilirsiniz. 
"Serbest Çalışma" ile gün içinde karşılaştığınız yeni kelimeleri uygulamaya ekleyerek ezberleyebilir ve düzenli tekrarlarını yapabilirsiniz.

Ezberle'de Hangi Kelime Setleri Mevcut?
"The Oxford 3000™ A1 to B2 Level", "The Oxford 5000™ B2 to C1 Level" ve "YDS Önemli Kelimeler 4000" kelime setleri ile İngilizce kelime ile ezber çalışmalarınızı yapabilirsiniz. 
TOEFL ve IELTS için kelime setleri de ilerleyen zamanlarda eklenecektir.

"En Yaygın Kullanılan 1000 Kelime" kelime seti ile İspanyolca kelime ile ezber çalışmalarınızı yapabilirsiniz. 

Ezberle Nasıl Çalışır?
Ezber çalışması yaparken uygulama seçtiğiniz kelime setine ait kelimelerden kolaydan zora, zordan kolaya veya karışık şekilde kelimeleri size önerir. Bu kelimeyi ezberlemek için karşınıza Türkçe anlamlarını güncel online sözlük ile listeler ve kendinize en yakın anlamı veya anlamları seçerek kaydetmenizi sağlar. Ek olarak ana dil için resmi olarak sunulan online sözlükten örnek cümleler seçerek kaydetmenizi ve telaffuzunu dinlemenizi sağlar. Kelime çalışma sayfasında bulunan serbest not alabileceğiniz bir alan ile de kelimeyi hatırlatıcı kendinize ait notlar alarak çalışmanızı zenginleştirebilirsiniz.

Ezberle’nin en önemli özelliği ise yeni ezberlediğiniz kelimeleri, uzun süreli hafızanıza yerleştirmek için günlük olarak size hangi kelimeleri tekrar etmeniz gerektiğini sunması. Kelimeye dair ilk ezberinizden 1, 7, 10, 21 ve 30 gün sonra uygulama kelimeyi tekrar karşınıza getirerek düzenli tekrar yapmanızı ve kelimeyi uzun süreli hafızanıza almanızı sağlar.

Tekrar çalışmasında kelime size kilitli olarak gösterilir. Bu şekilde kelimenin anlamından kendisini hatırlamaya çalışırsınız. Bu yöntem hem Türkçeden yabancı dile hem de yabancı dilden Türkçeye iki yönlü zengin bir ezber çalışması yapmanızı sağlar.

Bunun haricinde istediğiniz zaman “Az, orta ve çok tekrar“ kategorileri şeklinde kelimelerinizi kendi ihtiyacınıza yönelik olarak tekrarlayabilirsiniz.

Tüm Özellikler
•	Ezber Çalışması
o	Farklı dillerde tanımlı setler ve kendi eklediğiniz kelimeler ile ezberleme çalışması yapma
o	Uygulama içinde online sözlük kullanarak kelimelerin çeşitli anlamları ile çalışabilme
o	Uygulama içinde ana dil için resmi olarak sunulan online sözlüğü kullanarak kelimeler ile ilgili örnek cümleler ile çalışabilme
o	Uygulama içinde ana dil için resmi olarak sunulan online sözlük ile kelimelerin telaffuzlarını dinleme

•	Tekrar Çalışması
o	Ezberlenen kelimeler ile zaman planlı olarak günlük tekrar çalışması yapma
o	Ezberlenen kelimeler ile rastgele tekrar çalışması yapma
o	Tekrar çalışmasında kelimeyi kilitli göstererek anlamından kelimeyi hatırlatma
o	Tamamen ezberlenen kelime için “Önemli” veya “Önemsiz” kutularına göndererek bir daha gözükmemesini sağlama

•	Profil
o	Kelime ezberleme çalışma istatistikleri
o	Günlük çalışma sayıları takvimi ve grafiği
o	Günlük ileri tarihli tekrar sayıları takvimi ve grafiği
o	Ezber çalışması yapılan kelime setleri ve kelimeler listesi
o	Kelimeleri ekstra tekrar yapabilmek için ekleme

•	Ayarlar
o	Koyu/açık görünüm seçimi
o	Kolaydan zora ve zordan kolaya çalışma yapma seçimi
o	Kelime türüne göre çalışma yapma seçimi

o	Tüm uygulama kullanıcıları veya arkadaşlarınızla yarışma imkânı

Level up your mathematics skills and become King of Math! 

King of Math is a fast-paced mathematics game with lots of fun and diverse problems in different areas. Starting as a male or female farmer, you level up your character by answering math questions and improving your total score. New character design and music for each of the ten levels. Collect stars, get achievements and compare your scores against your friends and players all over the world! 

Playing King of Math is a great way to improve or refresh you mathematical skills and you will have a lot of fun doing it! The mathematics level is about Middle School/Junior High School.
